title: GenAI Engineering Workshops
blurb: Delivering hands-on AI workshops to 150+ engineers on MCP servers and AI agents
description: Lead facilitator for comprehensive GenAI training programs, delivering hands-on workshops to 150+ engineers on internal MCP server usage and AI agent best practices. Focus on practical implementation, code review automation, and developer productivity improvements through AI tool adoption.

title: Technical Evangelism
blurb: Defining North Star visions and spreading AI adoption across engineering teams
description: Technical evangelist focused on driving GenAI adoption and defining strategic technical visions. Authored comprehensive documentation including 'Getting Started with Contract Testing' and onboarded 4 service teams to streamline HTTP and Kafka Pact contracts. Present technical strategies to engineering and product leadership.

title: Mentorship & Code Review
blurb: Mentoring junior engineers and conducting technical interviews
description: Active mentor for junior and mid-level engineers, providing high-level code reviews, technical guidance, and career development support. Conduct technical interviews and help shape engineering hiring practices. Focus on building strong engineering culture and knowledge sharing.

title: Open Source Contributions
blurb: Created WebRTC Node package with React components, ~21 downloads per month
description: Developed and maintain a Node.js package exposing functions and React components for implementing WebRTC video capturing into web applications. Currently receives ~21 downloads per month. Contribute to various open source projects focused on web development and AI tooling.
